entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 5 with temperature falling to minus 17 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light before morning. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
